================================================================================
  MikroC USB HID Bootloader - Windows Installation
================================================================================

QUICK INSTALL
-------------

1. Right-click "install.ps1"
2. Select "Run with PowerShell"
3. Click "Yes" when prompted for Administrator privileges
4. Done! The program is now in your PATH


WHAT IT DOES
------------

The installer will:
- Copy files to: C:\Program Files\MikroHB\
- Add MikroHB to your system PATH
- Make "mikro_hb" command available from any terminal


USAGE
-----

After installation, open any PowerShell or Command Prompt and run:

    mikro_hb firmware.hex

Replace "firmware.hex" with the path to your hex file.


UNINSTALL
---------

1. Right-click "uninstall.ps1"
2. Select "Run with PowerShell"
3. Click "Yes" when prompted for Administrator privileges


REQUIREMENTS
------------

- Windows 7 or later
- No additional software needed (libusb included)


TROUBLESHOOTING
---------------

If "mikro_hb" command not found after install:
1. Close and reopen your terminal
2. Or restart your computer

If installation fails:
- Make sure you run as Administrator
- Check antivirus isn't blocking the installer
